title: Alien Zoo Adventure #42
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Quarantine Laboratory
rooms.description: A sterile white laboratory with containment pods lining the walls. Strange alien creatures float in glowing blue stasis fields. Warning lights blink on control panels, and the air smells of ozone and disinfectant. Through reinforced windows, you can see the main specimen halls. Emergency klaxons echo in the distance.

items.name: research station
items.description: A cluttered workstation covered with datapads and specimen analysis equipment

items.name: facility datapad
items.description: A digital tablet containing facility information
items.text: XENOZOOLOGICAL RESEARCH STATION ZETA - Established 2187. Director: Commander Sarah Vex. Chief Xenobiologist: Dr. Marcus Webb. Remember: All dangerous specimens are housed in the high-security containment sector. Emergency protocols require proper identification.

items.name: equipment storage locker
items.description: A tall metal locker with three compartments for storing lab equipment

items.name: safety procedures manual
items.description: A thick manual outlining facility safety protocols
items.text: SAFETY PROTOCOLS: This facility was established in 2187 to study extraterrestrial lifeforms. All personnel must carry proper identification. Director Vex oversees all operations. Dangerous specimens are kept in high-security containment. In emergencies, evacuate to the escape pod bay.

items.name: security access keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard with clearance level markings

items.name: specimen containment pod alpha
items.description: A cylindrical pod containing a small floating alien creature with tentacles
items.text: SPECIMEN ALPHA-7: Tentacled organism from Kepler-442b. Status: CONTAINED. Threat Level: LOW.

items.name: locked medical cabinet
items.description: A white cabinet with a biohazard symbol and electronic lock

items.name: emergency medical kit
items.description: A first aid kit with supplies for treating injuries

items.name: personnel assignment roster
items.description: A document listing all facility staff and their roles
items.text: STATION PERSONNEL: Commander Sarah Vex - Facility Director. Dr. Marcus Webb - Chief Xenobiologist. Lieutenant Chen - Security Chief. Technician Rodriguez - Maintenance. Note: You are assigned as Xenobiologist on this mission.

items.name: containment hall door
items.description: A heavy reinforced door with a card reader, leading to the main specimen containment area

rooms.name: Specimen Containment Hall
rooms.description: A massive chamber with rows of glowing containment cells housing bizarre alien creatures. Some cells are empty with shattered glass. Claw marks score the walls. Emergency lights cast everything in red. A control station monitors all specimens. The high-security sector door stands sealed at the far end.

items.name: specimen monitoring station
items.description: A bank of screens showing status readings for all containment cells
items.text: CONTAINMENT STATUS: Sector A - 12 specimens secure. Sector B - 8 specimens secure. High-Security Sector - 3 specimens BREACH DETECTED. Warning: Dangerous specimens have escaped containment. Evacuation recommended.

items.name: specimen cell twelve
items.description: A large cell containing a crystalline alien lifeform that pulses with inner light
items.text: SPECIMEN 12: Silicon-based organism from Tau Ceti. Communicates through light patterns. Status: CONTAINED. Threat Level: MINIMAL.

items.name: specimen cell nineteen
items.description: An empty cell with broken glass and scorch marks
items.text: SPECIMEN 19: CONTAINMENT BREACH. Predatory organism from Wolf 359. Last seen heading toward high-security sector. Threat Level: EXTREME.

items.name: observation desk
items.description: A desk where researchers record specimen behavior and observations

items.name: xenobiologist research journal
items.description: A digital journal with detailed specimen notes
items.text: Dr. Webb's Log: The specimens in high-security containment are our most dangerous acquisitions. Commander Vex has authorized extreme caution protocols. As xenobiologists, we must remember our training. The escape pods are our only way out if containment fails completely.

items.name: emergency supply crate
items.description: A metal crate with emergency supplies and equipment

items.name: handheld plasma cutter
items.description: A tool used for cutting through metal and sealed doors

items.name: emergency evacuation guide
items.description: A laminated card with evacuation procedures
items.text: EMERGENCY EVACUATION PROTOCOL: In case of catastrophic containment failure, proceed immediately to escape pod bay. Security verification required. You must confirm: Who commands this facility? Where are the most dangerous specimens kept? What is your role here?

items.name: information terminal
items.description: A wall-mounted terminal displaying facility information
items.text: FACILITY DIRECTORY: Quarantine Lab - Specimen Processing. Containment Hall - General Population Housing. High-Security Sector - Dangerous Specimen Storage. Escape Pod Bay - Emergency Evacuation. Director's Office - Commander Vex.

items.name: escape pod bay door
items.description: A sealed emergency door leading to the escape pod bay. A security terminal displays three verification questions that must be answered correctly.

password_questions.question: Who is the facility director?
password_questions.hint: Check the facility datapad and personnel roster for the director's name

password_questions.question: Where are dangerous specimens kept?
password_questions.hint: The safety manual and monitoring station mention where dangerous specimens are housed

password_questions.question: What is your role?
password_questions.hint: The personnel roster lists your assignment on this mission

rooms.name: Emergency Escape Pod Bay
rooms.description: You have reached the escape pod bay! A sleek emergency evacuation pod sits ready in its launch cradle. Through the viewport, you can see the stars and the safety of space beyond. The pod's systems are online and ready for immediate departure. Warning lights flash as the facility's containment systems continue to fail behind you.

items.name: emergency escape pod
items.description: A compact spacecraft designed for emergency evacuation to the nearest space station

items.name: pod launch console
items.description: The control panel for initiating the escape pod launch sequence
items.text: LAUNCH SYSTEM READY. All systems green. Destination: Orbital Station Gamma. Estimated travel time: 4 hours. Press LAUNCH to evacuate.

items.name: observation viewport
items.description: A reinforced window showing the vast expanse of space and distant stars

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You board the escape pod and initiate the launch sequence. The pod rockets away from the failing alien zoo facility as containment breaches spread throughout the station. Through the viewport, you watch the facility shrink into the distance as you head toward safety. You have escaped the alien zoo and survived to tell the tale. You win!
